title: Designing Evaluation Strategies for Remote English Teaching Training Programs

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Practice-oriented program applying literature-based principles and case studies to help in-service secondary English teachers design and operate effective remote assessments

learning_goals: Design and utilize three or more formative assessment tools suitable for remote education contexts.
Develop an evaluation system applying five indicators to measure learner engagement in online synchronous classes.
Operate an assignment feedback system using digital tools (videoconferencing platforms, LMS, etc.).
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
